issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. click "Create Report" button
2. fill in all fields in "Add charge" section
3. click "Add to report"
4. click on 'X' icon on the end of the charge row

Expected result: the charge should be removed from the "Charges" table
Actual result: the charge isn't removed

Workaround: if you click somewhere else on the screen, hold the button clicked, move to the 'X' icon and release the button, the charge is removed. (see the attached video)
fields.summary: Win8: User can't delete a charge from a report (A)
fields.environment: Windows 8 on a VM, tablet simulator

comments.body: What needs to be done is disable the zoom effect when clicking on a list item.
